mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY
INSERT INTO tb_alo_directory ( sid, scode, pid, sname, fname, dtype, sortt, del_flag, create_dt, create_by, update_dt, update_by, versionn) values( #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{dtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_alo_directory
scode = #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fname = #{fname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
dtype = #{dtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortt = #{sortt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_dt = #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_dt = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
versionn = #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT sid, scode, pid, sname, fname, dtype, sortt, del_flag, create_dt, create_by, update_dt, update_by, versionn FROM tb_alo_directory
